mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(tb2.id) num,tb2.`quarter`, case when tb2.`quarter` = 1 then '儿童' when tb2.`quarter` = 2 then '少年' when tb2.`quarter` = 3 then '青年' when tb2.`quarter` = 4 then '中年' else '老年' end as quarterStr FROM( SELECT *, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, tb1.dateofbirth, CURDATE()) < 7 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, tb1.dateofbirth, CURDATE()) < 18 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, tb1.dateofbirth, CURDATE()) < 41 then 3 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, tb1.dateofbirth, CURDATE()) < 66 then 4 else 5 end as quarter FROM t_b_patient tb1 WHERE tb1.id IN( SELECT patientid FROM t_b_apply WHERE orgcode = #{orgCode} AND ispaid = 1 ) )AS tb2 GROUP BY tb2.`quarter` ORDER BY tb2.`quarter`

SELECT t1.* FROM t_b_patient t1 WHERE t1.id NOT IN ( SELECT t2.patientid FROM tb_patient_blacklist t2 WHERE t2.orgcode = #{orgCode} AND t2.removed = 0 ) AND t1.id IN(SELECT t1.patientid FROM t_b_apply t1 WHERE orgcode = #{orgCode} GROUP BY t1.patientid) ORDER BY t1.modifyat DESC
SELECT t1.* FROM t_b_patient t1 WHERE t1.id IN ( SELECT t2.patientid FROM tb_patient_blacklist t2 WHERE t2.orgcode = #{orgCode} AND t2.removed = 0 ) ORDER BY modifyat DESC
